result.eng: Life as it was a long time ago.
result.ga: An saol mar a bhí fadó
result.orig: An saol mar a bhí fadó
result.html: An saol mar a bhí fadóLife as it was a long time ago.
result.ponchtml: An saol mar a ḃí fadóLife as it was a long time ago.

result.eng: Ireland was a poor country a long time ago.
result.ga: Ba thír bhocht í Éire fadó
result.orig: Ba thír bhocht í Éire fadó
result.html: Ba thír bhocht í Éire fadóIreland was a poor country a long time ago.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṫír ḃoċt í Éire fadóIreland was a poor country a long time ago.

result.eng: Once upon a time there was a king.
result.ga: Fadó fadó bhí rí ann
result.html: Fadó fadó bhí rí annOnce upon a time there was a king.
